entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
